b'@el_macacosad @luvhabs @Scaramucci I agree.  Luckily I have zero risk.  I think I invested $400....so I will likely never sell.

I learned my lesson 20 years ago.

I bought 1,000 shares of $CIEN at $8.  Sold at $17 a month later.

2 years later it hit $780.

I was in my early 20\xe2\x80\x99s.  It was brutal.  Life changing.'
